page.title: 15POPULATION
page.content: IN THE{LUTHRIE}AND{MOONZIE}AREA THERE ARE{89 PEOPLE.}THERE ARE SLIGHTLY FEWER PEOPLE IN{LUTHRIE}AND{MOONZIE THAN THERE WERE{20 YEARS}AGO ACCORDING TO THE RESIDENTS WHO WERE INTERVIEWED. ABOUT{\}OF THE ADULTS ARE{OLD AGE {PENSIONERS.}MOST OF THE CHILDREN IN THE VILLAGES ARE NOT VERY OLD.ABOUT THREE QUARTERS OF THEM ARE UNDER{4 {YEARS}OF AGE.A LARGE PART OF THE WORKING POPULATION IS EMPLOYED OUTSIDE THE AREA PROBABLY OWING TO THE FACT THAT THERE ARE NOT SO MANY PEOPLE EMPLOYED ON THE LOCAL FARMS BECAUSE OF MECHANISATION. THERE ARE FEWER PEOPLE WORKING ON FARMS NOWADAYS.MORE THAN ONE QUARTER OF THE POPULATION IN THIS AREA IS{UNEMPLOYED.
